name: John Hemmit
experience: 5 years of rafting experience and 2 years of professional rafting guide experience
bio: I have been rafting sense I was 18 and I love it. I enjoy being able to keep others safe and be able to experience these great trips together usually as groups and as families.

name: Paul Strong
experience: 1 year of professional rafting guide experience and 10 years of rafting experience
bio: I got into rafting when I was just 16 and I have been doing it personally ever sense. I just recently got into being a guide for others so they can enjoy this great sport as much as I have.

name: Jannet Smith
experience: 3 years of rafting experience and 6 months of professional rafting guide experience
bio: I didnt get into rafting untill I went on a trip with my friends and I was hooked on it. Now im happy to give that same experience to others.
